channel.description: Recent content in Computer Architecture on Haoran You

item.title: [ISCA 2020] SmartExchange: Trading Higher-cost Memory Storage/Access for Lower-cost Computation
item.description: Accepted as ISCA 2020 regular paper! Abstract: We present SmartExchange, an algorithm-hardware co-design framework to trade higher-cost memory storage/access for lower-cost computation, for energy-efficient inference of deep neural networks (DNNs).
